description: Try our easy to follow Simple Corn & Bacon Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Simple Corn & Bacon Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture into the oiled holes and place in a preheated oven, 218°C, for 1520 minutes until golden and just firm to the touch. Remove from the oven and transfer to a wire rack to cool.
